<a id="X509Certificate"></a>

# X509Certificate

**Inherits:** [Resource](Resource.md) **\<** [RefCounted](RefCounted.md) **\<** [Object](Object.md)

An X509 certificate (e.g. for TLS).

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

The X509Certificate class represents an X509 certificate. Certificates can be loaded and saved like any other [Resource](Resource.md).

They can be used as the server certificate in [StreamPeerTLS.accept_stream()](StreamPeerTLS.md#StreamPeerTLS_method_accept_stream) (along with the proper [CryptoKey](CryptoKey.md)), and to specify the only certificate that should be accepted when connecting to a TLS server via [StreamPeerTLS.connect_to_stream()](StreamPeerTLS.md#StreamPeerTLS_method_connect_to_stream).

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Tutorials

- [SSL certificates](../tutorials/networking/ssl_certificates.md)

<!-- classref-method -->

[Error](@GlobalScope.md#enum_@GlobalScope_Error) **load**\ (\ path\: [String](String.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#X509Certificate_method_load)

Loads a certificate from `path` ("\*.crt" file).

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="X509Certificate_method_load_from_string"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[Error](@GlobalScope.md#enum_@GlobalScope_Error) **load_from_string**\ (\ string\: [String](String.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#X509Certificate_method_load_from_string)

Loads a certificate from the given `string`.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="X509Certificate_method_save"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[Error](@GlobalScope.md#enum_@GlobalScope_Error) **save**\ (\ path\: [String](String.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#X509Certificate_method_save)

Saves a certificate to the given `path` (should be a "\*.crt" file).

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="X509Certificate_method_save_to_string"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[String](String.md) **save_to_string**\ (\ ) [ðŸ”—](#X509Certificate_method_save_to_string)

Returns a string representation of the certificate, or an empty string if the certificate is invalid.
